name: Invaders The Resurrection
description:
Invaders The Resurrection is a space shooter that combines classic gameplay with modern graphics and sound, as well as having unique gameplay elements.

HOW TO PLAY

The controls are entirely based on the touch screen: slide your finger along the bottom of the screen to move the ship and shoot automatically.

FEATURES

- Pixel Art Graphics

- Modern Sound

- Different type of enemies

- Levels grow in difficulty

- Boss Battle

DOWNLOAD ON GOOGLE PLAY STORE
